content.rendered:
Ways to Give

GEOKC Way to Give includes the different names of campaigns or ways to give which fulfill our mission and also the required needs of fundraising to keep it active. To build a Hindu community internationally GEOKC invites all Hindu members, living anywhere on this earth to be a part to join our activities to benefit themselves via supporting some Seva as bhakti. Way to Give describes the main reason of our current needs also the needs for future. It’s give the explanation of lifelong financial stability with the correct definition of our funding needs to keep GEOKC mission active to be followed by next generation.

The names of these campaigns are now related with Annual Fund, Major Gift & Planned Giving, Capital Campaigns, Bhoomi Dann, Endowment Fund, Tribute Gift, Donor Recognition Wall, and Other Giving Sevas of GEOKC. For yearly annual giving donations, please click on GEOKC Annual Fund below to follow through:

GEOKC Annual Fund

The following are GEOKC Capital Campaign areas. Prior to donating in any of the following areas, please check first with the GEOKC Campaigns Team (Team Three) to donate:

  • GEOKC Building Project Seva (donation)
  • GEOKC Architecture Works
  • Bhoomi Daan Seva (land donation)
  • Specific Needs Awareness Plan
  • Well Wishing Opportunity
  • Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty
  • GEOKC Endowment Fund (Specific Help)
  • Major Gifts and Planned Giving
  • GEOKC Donors Recognition Wall
  • GEOKC Donor Recognition Programs

GEOKC Capital Campaign
